= 栏目管理 =
<p>
	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">栏目是系统频道某一类内容的集合体。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">您可以在频道中设置多个一级栏目，在一级栏目中添加多个二级栏目&hellip;&hellip;。<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">FreeCMS</span>的栏目设置具有无级分类功能。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<b style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">1.<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">    </span></span></span></b><b style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">添加一级栏目</span></b></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">从左侧管理菜单点击栏目管理进入。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
